headline: Could Grocery Expansion and Holiday Deals Signal a New Phase for Dollar General’s (DG) Local Strategy?
summary: Dollar General recently opened a new DG Market in Los Fresnos, Texas, offering fresh groceries, local career opportunities, and expanding its community engagement, while also launching its annual Holiday Toy Book with exclusive, affordable deals both in-store and online. These moves highlight Dollar General’s dual focus on strengthening its role in local communities and catering to value-oriented holiday shoppers through expanded product variety and digital convenience just ahead of the...

headline: You’re Leaving Money on the Table if You Don’t Own These 3 Monthly Dividend REITs
summary: Well-run real estate investment trusts (or REITs) can be some of the best dividend stocks in your portfolio. Realty Income (NYSE:O), LTC Properties (NYSE:LTC), and AGNC Investment (NASDAQ:AGNC) pay monthly, so you get 12 checks a year instead of 4. They compound faster and align more naturally with people’s spending habits. Plus, REITs are obligated ... You’re Leaving Money on the Table if You Don’t Own These 3 Monthly Dividend REITs
